<details>
<summary>Linear regression model</summary>

- What is linear regression model?
    - fit a line or model to the training data such that it gives minimum error (cost function). model parameters are adjusted to get the desired model.
    - ![Untitled](Supervised%20Machine%20learning%20Regression%20and%20classif%2088010aee33fa44fdb3ab3ec14086fccf/Untitled%203.png)
- Example: House sizes and prices
- What is cost function?
    - it helps us visualize how well our model is predicting by comparing the value predicted by the model to the actual target data in the training set.
    - cost function may vary according to the model
    - for example: Generally for linear regression model, mean squared error is used as cost function
    - ![Untitled](Supervised%20Machine%20learning%20Regression%20and%20classif%2088010aee33fa44fdb3ab3ec14086fccf/Untitled%204.png)
</details>

<details>
<summary>Gradient descent in practice</summary>

- feature scaling
    - large features → small parameter values
    - small features → large parameter values
    - ![Untitled](Supervised%20Machine%20learning%20Regression%20and%20classif%2088010aee33fa44fdb3ab3ec14086fccf/Untitled%2017.png)
    - **scaling the feature to lie in similar range results in faster gradient descent**
    - ![Untitled](Supervised%20Machine%20learning%20Regression%20and%20classif%2088010aee33fa44fdb3ab3ec14086fccf/Untitled%2018.png)
    - ![Untitled](Supervised%20Machine%20learning%20Regression%20and%20classif%2088010aee33fa44fdb3ab3ec14086fccf/Untitled%2019.png)
    - methods for scaling:
        - normalization : divide by max value of parameter
        - mean normalization
        - z-normalization
- Checking gradient descent for convergence
    - ![Untitled](Supervised%20Machine%20learning%20Regression%20and%20classif%2088010aee33fa44fdb3ab3ec14086fccf/Untitled%2020.png)
    - ![Untitled](Supervised%20Machine%20learning%20Regression%20and%20classif%2088010aee33fa44fdb3ab3ec14086fccf/Untitled%2021.png)
- Feature engineering
    - ![Untitled](Supervised%20Machine%20learning%20Regression%20and%20classif%2088010aee33fa44fdb3ab3ec14086fccf/Untitled%2022.png)
